meanings.definition: Mispoints: to mark or indicate incorrectly
meanings.sent1: She mispoints the location on the map, causing confusion.
meanings.sent2: He often mispoints the answers in his homework assignments.
meanings.sent3: The comedian mispoints the punchline, making the joke fall flat.
meanings.sent4: Her compass mispoints north, leading her in the wrong direction.
meanings.sent5: The faulty GPS mispoints the destination, causing them to get lost.

meanings.definition: Mispoints: points that are marked or indicated incorrectly
meanings.sent1: The mispoints on the map led them astray during the hike.
meanings.sent2: The mispoints on the scoreboard caused confusion among the players.
meanings.sent3: The mispoints on the treasure map made the search more challenging.
meanings.sent4: The mispoints in the document caused errors in the calculations.
meanings.sent5: The mispoints on the signpost caused travelers to take the wrong road.
